= EPJURLError =

*Project:* [HotLabelComponent Hot Label Component].

*Unit:* _PJHotLabel_.

Exceptions of this class are used to report URL related errors by _[TPJHotLabel TPJHotLabel]_. The exceptions are raised either when URLs fail validation or when default browsers or mail clients can't be started.

_EPJURLError_ inherits directly from _Exception_ and adds no new methods, properties or events.
